data.title: Yedida Hiller Professionals
data.meta_description: Goodwin Professional Yedida Hiller, from New York, serves as Director, Lateral Associate Recruitment.
data.text: Yedida Hiller is the Director of Lateral Associate Recruitment in Goodwin’s Legal Talent Acquisition department. She is responsible for the overall management of lateral associate hiring, entry-level hiring and law school-based recruitment (including the summer program) for Goodwin’s New York office. Yedida has over 13 years of legal recruitment experience.
